DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether investigational drug INCB013739 effect systemic adipose tissue 11-HSD1 activity obese , insulin resistant subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect INCB013739 Cortisone Reducing Enzyme Activity Obese People Predisposed Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 year 65 year age . BMI 30 42 kg/m2 , inclusive . FPG < 126 mg/dL Meet criterion diagnosis diabetes mellitus screen evaluation , female subject history gestational diabetes permit . Are receive oral antidiabetic agent within 3 month prior screen .
